data.text:
@TimSheehyMT “The worst & the most dangerous are the ‘me-firsters.’ Most of them are intelligent & totally ruthless. They USE the service for their OWN GAIN & will not hesitate to stick a knife in your back at the slightest indication you might stand in their way.” Robin Olds.
Sound familiar? https://t.co/SpLDPnqcEu

@TimSheehyMT And that he was Senator! Have not seen anything about him in too long! Thank you so much, Sir!  I can’t remember what was said or anything, but that job to memory of many times him being on the news to the Senate  and more !    

Act This old woman’s headed back to Great Lakes

@TimSheehyMT Trump is a liar,he did not keep his promise to the Iranians.Trump is afraid of Khamenei because he is in agreement with the murderous and child-killing regime of Iran.We no longer hope for Trump. Please,Netanyahu,stand firm and put an end to this murderous and terrorist regime.

@TimSheehyMT The Islamic Republic spent decades funding and arming America’s enemies.
Nearly 2,000 U.S. troops were killed as a result.
The richest terrorist network in history—built on Iran’s oil and gold.
That’s a betrayal of American blood.
And a betrayal of the Iranian people as well. https://t.co/SwLKQH50kF
@TimSheehyMT I hope a guy like Olds could succeed in today's military.
@TimSheehyMT You could pull it off. I say go for it.
@TimSheehyMT F-4, loud as hell! My friend and O got buzzed by two of them while fishing in Lake Ontario. I saluted. It was awesome! The sonic boom was epic.
